title: Horizon Blue Cross Blue Shield of New Jersey (Horizon BCBSNJ) - NJ Health Insurance & Healthcare Provider
text: Low and No-Cost Plans You may qualify for our Medicaid Managed Care plan offered through NJ FamilyCare. Go to Horizon NJ Health or call 1-800-637-2997Looking for a Medicare Plan? Find the coverage that fits you best with a choice of Medicare plans and options. Go to Medicare or call 1-877-234-1240Thank you to our members for putting their trust in our coverage. Horizon is #1 in Member Satisfaction among Commercial Health Plans in NJ1 Health Care Cost and Quality Horizon is addressing the rising costs of health care to keep it affordable and accessible for all. A Healthier You, Covered By Blue You’re more than just a number to us. You’re someone who matters and you deserve a health plan that always puts you first. More to Explore Doctor and Hospital Finder Search our directory of over 70,000 providers. Horizon Behavioral Health Because good health isn’t just physical, we offer a wide range of programs for emotional and mental well-being. SHBP/SEHBP Learn more about the State Health Benefits Program (SHBP) and School Employees' Health Benefits Program (SEHBP). Horizon Health News See how the latest national and local health care headlines affect you and your family. Inclusion and Opportunity Read about our commitment to inclusion among our employees, members, physicians and business partners. Horizon Foundation for New Jersey Our mission as the philanthropic arm of Horizon is to support organizations that make New Jersey healthier.
